page.title: 14Customs
page.content: {May Fair The May Fair is a fair which sells clothes,books,toys,plants etc and has games to play on. This year it had a fire engine and a train to ride on.The money that is raised goes to Studham Church.There are Maypole dances by Studham School at the beginning of each May Fair. Susan and Jonathan {Michaelmas Fair} The Michaelmas Fair began in 1977.It is held at the back of Studham. Drinks sweets,clothes,books,and china are in the hall. The stalls and games which are outside are hoopla, ducks, hit the tins,clown stall and cover the 50p with a coin. Rachel {Bonfire Night} There ha s been a bonfire night celebration on Studham Common for many years.
